noun.description: The state of being a slave.
examples: the deliverance of the Israelites from Egypt's bondage

noun.description: Sexual practice that involves the tying up or restraining of one partner.

origin: Middle English: from Anglo-Latin bondagium, from Middle English bond serf (earlier peasant, householder), from Old Norse bóndi tiller of the soil, based on búa dwell; influenced in sense by bond.
